cards.title: I Fell In Love with ChatGPT
cards.description: I designed this book for Moughton-Hifflin's new line of AI-themed romance books.

cards.title: The Shakespeare Time Machine
cards.description: Maggie O'Farrell meets H.G. Wells in this historical fiction book I designed for Juxtaposition Publishing.

cards.title: Our New ChatBot Overlords
cards.description: A dystopian AI future awaits us all in this science fiction title I designed for H. J. Simpson Press.

cards.title: Yo, Yossarian!
cards.description: A biography of the character John Yossarian from Joseph Heller's novel Catch-22; designed for Hyperbole Editions.

cards.title: The Mystery of the Missing Sock
cards.description: A perennial mystery gets solved in this whodunit, which I designed for The Butler Did It Publications.

cards.title: The Old Person's Guide to TikTok
cards.description: I designed the cover of this TikTok how-to guide for Old People Are People, Too Press.
